verses.verse: And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> instead of <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4427>king<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

But neither he, nor his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, nor the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, did <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3081>Jehucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%> and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> now unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for us.
Now <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: for they had not <S%H5414>put<s%> him into <S%H1004%H3628>prison<s%>.

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> was come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and when the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8088>tidings<s%> of them, they <S%H5927>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
¶ Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you unto me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me; Behold, <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>, which is come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> you, shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into their own <S%H776>land<s%>.
And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H3920>take<s%> it, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H5377>Deceive<s%> not <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H1980>surely<s%> <S%H3212>depart<s%> from us: for they shall not <S%H3212>depart<s%>.

For though ye had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the whole <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against you, and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> but <S%H1856>wounded<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> among them, yet should they rise <S%H6965>up<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, that when the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> was broken <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>,

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, to <S%H2505>separate<s%> himself thence in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And when he was in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, a <S%H1167>captain<s%> of the <S%H6488>ward<s%> was there, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3376>Irijah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>; and he <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou fallest <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, It is <S%H8267>false<s%>; I fall not <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>. But he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not to him: so <S%H3376>Irijah<s%> <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to the <S%H8269>princes<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H8269>princes<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H612>prison<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>: for they had <S%H6213>made<s%> that the <S%H3608>prison<s%>.

¶ When <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> was <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H1004%H953>dungeon<s%>, and into the <S%H2588>cabins<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and took him <S%H3947>out<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him <S%H5643>secretly<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there any <S%H1697>word<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, There <S%H3426>is<s%>: for, <S%H559>said<s%> he, thou shalt be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, What have I <S%H2398>offended<s%> against thee, or against thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, or against this <S%H5971>people<s%>, that ye have <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H1004%H3608>prison<s%>?

Where are <S%H346>now<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> against you, nor against this <S%H776>land<s%>?

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> now, I pray thee, O my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>: let my <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, I pray thee, be <S%H5307>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; that thou cause me not to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, lest I <S%H4191>die<s%> there.

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H6485>commit<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>, and that they should <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> out of the <S%H644>bakers'<s%> <S%H2351>street<s%>, until all the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> were <S%H8552>spent<s%>. Thus <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>.
